title: 'Read and write production data'
---

## Coming soon

This guide will show you how to handle data I/O in production environments with Xorq.

You will learn production-ready patterns for reading from and writing to various data sources.

**What you'll accomplish:**
- Read from production data sources
- Write results to production systems
- Handle file formats (CSV, Parquet, JSON)
- Manage connection credentials securely

**Prerequisites:**
- Completed Quickstart
- Familiarity with your data source

Check back soon for the complete guide.
